eng_word: He built it according to what is written

eng_before: and I will send them out

eng_after: so that he may be struck down

eng_before: The accounts of the sons [of Joash],
and his deeds of loving devotion,
along with his deeds of loving devotion
of those who had first returned,

eng_after: before one of them came to be.
and in full view of the people,
